definition[0]: the metal bars and frame that hold the wood, coal etc in a fireplace
definition[1]: to rub cheese, vegetables etc against a rough or sharp surface in order to break them into small pieces
definition[2]: to talk in a low rough voice
example[3]: Mr Fen had a loud voice that grated on her ears.
definition[4]: to make an unpleasant sound by rubbing, or to make something do this
example[4]: The stones beneath her shoes grated harshly.
